I See Me!: Hey, this is Sarah. Thanks for checking out our site! ðŸ˜Š https://iseeme.attn.tv/axJdXnqYp4wF 

Are you looking for anything in particular today?

Yes Sarah I was thinking about ordering the Sherpa welcome blanket as an addition to the book but cannot see the personalization or size etc . What is the message on the back of the green book holder ?

I See Me!: I appreciate your interest! Can you please confirm which of these Sherpa Blankets you're interested in? https://iseeme.attn.tv/awana8huJ819 I'll be more than happy to look into this for you!

I See Me!: Thanks for the screenshot! I see that you sent the blanket screenshot. The size is listed on the product page under "Details" as 30 x 40 inches: https://iseeme.attn.tv/ao-8zflkwBo1 

Can you clarify, when you asked "What is the message on the back of the green book holder?" are you referring to this book? https://iseeme.attn.tv/azlFHKC36OL0

I See Me!: Complete your Goodnight Little Me personalized book for a cozy, memorable bedtime keepsake.

Shop now: https://iseeme.attn.tv/a14vtAOyIl6U .
That's the book but there's an add-on
I See Me!: The add-on for the "Goodnight Little Me" book includes a personalized message on the back of the green book holder. For more details, please visit: https://iseeme.attn.tv/akqPxjV7E9ql
The blanket includes personalization but I don't see a sample

I See Me!: Thanks for sharing the screenshot. If you don't like to have the add-on with your order, you can try to click on the "Remove item" button at the bottom of the add-on item. Let me know how it goes!
I would like to see the messaging on the keepsake box? Also don't I need to approve personalization on blanket?

I See Me!: Good questions. You typically do not need to provide a separate approval after placing your order. When you customize on our website, you will see a preview of how the name and details will appear. Once you add the item to your cart and complete the checkout, the personalization is final. Our website usually includes a checkbox or a prompt during the "Personalize Now" step, where you confirm that the spelling and details are correct.

Concerning the Keepsake Box, for Small Board Books he inside of the box typically features the message: "A book is a gift that keeps on giving."
Some boxes (like the "My Very Own Name" edition) feature gold-accented covers and are designed to be "ready to surprise," but the primary message is often the one focused on the "gift of a book." I hope this clarifies.
As an addon the blanket doesn't provide a preview-i guess it uses the info provided on the book. The details indicate includes sender info which I do not want on the blanket
I See Me!: I see! Can you please send me a screenshot of the details you are seeing on your end so I can check?

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS using the "Escalation template"
templates: For 10% off welcome code issues use temp 'Follow up 1', then 'Follow up 2' after confirming the item is excluded from promos
For fridge recommendations use FRR shortcut
For service-related issues/scheduled repair service appointments use SRI shortcut
For cxs looking for replacement parts/accessories from an affiliate Parts Distributor use RPA shortcut
If a cx has an inquiry for finding the serial number/model number of an item:
âžœ If it's a TV, use mnt shortcut
âžœ If it's another product, use mna shortcut
dos_and_donts: If it's a new conversation and we didn't introduce ourselves in the automated message, start your message with: "This is Jordan at LG."
